definitions: a substance which does not readily allow the passage of heat or sound
shortDefinitions: substance preventing passage of heat or sound

definitions: a substance or device which does not readily conduct electricity

examples.text: a series of electrodes separated by insulators

shortDefinitions: substance or device not conducting electricity

definitions: a block of material, typically glass or ceramic, enclosing a wire carrying an electric current where it crosses a support.
shortDefinitions: block of insulating material enclosing wire
